column1: Figure 1. Prisoners under state and federal jurisdiction at yearend, 2000–2010
Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics Program
Author(s): Paul Guerino, Paige M. Harrison, and William J. Sabol
Figure 1. Prisoners under state and federal jurisdiction at yearend, 2000–2010
Note: Jurisdiction refers to the legal authority of state or federal correctional officials over a prisoner regardless of where the prisoner is held.
Source: BJS, National Prisoner Statistics Program.
